name: Clean Freak (KingMav)
description:
The cleaning biz is tough, and you've been running out of options.

But good things come to those who wait, and you've struck gold.

a fat stack to clean a house out in nowheresville, what could go wrong?

Good thing you were paid in advance... Clean the place up and get out of there.

Press E to pick up trash, and Q to drop it in the trash bins!

A game made for the 

Shitty Horror Game Jam

Art and design:

Cristone

Kip

Programming:

Connor

Maverick (KingMav on itch)
